name: Galaxy Hook: Together with the Hook
name_original: Galaxy Hook: Together with the Hook
description:
Was initially a submission for the GMTK Game Jam but missed submission time due to fixing gamebreakling bugs.

Controls:

WASD: To move

Left Mouse: Fire left gun

Right Mouse: Fire and Release grappling hook

Space: Jump and Release grappling hook

X: Change fire mode, switch between single fire, 3-round burst or full auto.

Credits:
Lukas Ax: itch.io - Level Design, AI Programming, 3D Modelling

Alexnader Tallnäs: itch.io - Gameplay Programming, Level Design, Audio

Jonah Kirtley: Artstation - Enviorment Artist, 3D Enviorment Modeling
